/*searchCustList */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT RS.WH_CD, RS.CUST_CD AS cust_id , dbo.TL_GET_CUST_NM(RS.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM , CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(RS.RCV_SHP_DT, 0, 9)) AS ST_DT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY RS.CUST_CD ORDER BY H.DATE DESC, CONVERT (DATE, SUBSTRING (RS.RCV_SHP_DT, 0, 9)) ASC) AS IDX , H.DATE AS cl_dt FROM WHM_RCV_SHP RS LEFT JOIN WHM_HST H ON H.CUST_CD = RS.CUST_CD AND RS.WH_CD = H.WH_CD AND H.DELT_FLG = 'N' WHERE 1=1 and RS.RCV_SHP_FLG = 'Y' and RS.WH_CD = #wh_cd# ) AS T WHERE T.IDX = 1
ORDER BY T.cust_id

/*searchClosingHst */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATE DESC) as ROWNUM, DATE AS DATESHEET, CONVERT(varchar(20), RATE, 1) AS RATESHEET, sum(CBF_QTY) as qty, ROUND(sum(CBF_QTY)*RATE, 2) as amount FROM WHM_HST WHERE 1 = 1 AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND CUST_CD = #cust_id# AND DELT_FLG = 'N' GROUP BY DATE, RATE ) AS T where T.ROWNUM > #beginIdx# AND T.ROWNUM <= #topCnt#
/* searchWarehouseCdList */ SELECT WH_CD, WH_NM FROM WHM_WH WHERE USE_FLG = 'Y'
